title: Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú), (Uimh. 2), 2021 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 2) 2021 ghairm den ordu seo

title: Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 28 Nollaig, 2021, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [708] 3 

Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: Na Rosa, Co. Dhún na nGall 

SCEIDEAL 

(1) Na limistéir toghroinne i gContae Dhún na nGall seo a leanas: Inis Mhic 
an Doirn, An Clochán Liath, Leitir Mhic an Bhaird agus An Machaire. 

(2) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Anagaire i gContae Dhún na nGall 
atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: An Bhráid, Droim na 
Ceárta, An Dún Mór, An Carn Buí, An Charraig Fhinn, Gort Lios 
Saighead, Mín Doire Ghabhann, Mullach Dearg, Sliabh Mhullach Dearg, 
Mullach Dubh Thuaidh agus Mullach Dubh Theas. 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh, 
 8 Nollaig 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Tuarasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [708] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 708 of 2021 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 2) ORDER 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [708] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 708 of 2021 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 2) ORDER 2021 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Replace with Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) 
Order 2020 (S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
text_norm: 2 ta na limisteir shonraitear sa sceideal ainmnithe mar limistear pleanala teanga ghaeltachta chun criocha alt 7(2) acht na gaeltachta 2012 (uimh 34 de 2012) foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 28 nollaig 2021 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo 708 3 limistear pleanala teanga na rosa co dhun na ngall sceideal (1) na limisteir toghroinne gcontae dhun na ngall seo leanas inis mhic doirn clochan liath leitir mhic bhaird agus machaire (2) chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair anagaire gcontae dhun na ngall ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas bhraid droim na cearta dun mor carn bui charraig fhinn gort lios saighead min doire ghabhann mullach dearg sliabh mhullach dearg mullach dubh thuaidh agus mullach dubh thea arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 8 nollaig 2021 jack chamber aire stait ag roinn tuarasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean 4 708 official translation tiontu oifigiuil statutory instrument s.i no 708 2021 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 2) order 2021 708 5 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 708 2021 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 2) order 2021 jack chamber minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) (as adapted culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (s.i no 403 2020)) replace tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020 (s.i no 547 2020) hereby order follows

title: Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 2) order 2021

title: Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [708] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

Language Planning Area: Na Rosa, Co. Donegal
text_norm: 2 area specified schedule designated gaeltacht language planning area purpose section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th december 2021 6 708 official translation tiontu oifigiuil language planning area na rosa co donegal

title: Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: (1) The following electoral division areas in County Donegal: Inis Mhic an
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

(1) The following electoral division areas in County Donegal: Inis Mhic an 
Doirn, An Clochán Liath, Leitir Mhic an Bhaird and An Machaire. 

(2) That part of the electoral division area of Anagaire in County Donegal 
which consists of the following townlands: An Bhráid, Droim na Ceárta, 
An Dún Mór, An Carn Buí, An Charraig Fhinn, Gort Lios Saighead, Mín 
Doire Ghabhann, Mullach Dearg, Sliabh Mhullach Dearg, Mullach Dubh 
Thuaidh and Mullach Dubh Theas. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 8 December 2021 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [708] 7 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
